node.title: Paraglider in critical condition after crashing down cliff face
node.description: The paraglider is in Dunedin Hospital after the crash this afternoon.
node.content:
["A paraglider is a critical condition in Dunedin Hospital after crashing near Wānaka this afternoon.", "", "
Treble Cone ski field. Photo: RNZ / Tess Brunton
", "A witness saw the paraglider in trouble at Treble Cone shortly before 1pm, police said.", "He crashed near Pyramid Peak, about 150 metres down a cliff face.", "The man was winched to safety by the Otago Rescue Helicopter, with assistance from Fire and Emergency and Alpine Cliff Rescue."]
